page.title: 19FAMILY LIFE ON SUNDAYS
page.content: 0n Sundays my dad likes a lie in but usually my sister wakes him up,she is only 4 yrs. old.When my sister doesn't wake him up my dad gets up at 10.30, so does the rest of the family.We all go downstairs for our breakfast. Sometimes on a Sunday we go to the seaside.We get ready and go in the car to Scarborough. As usual when we get there we can't get parked.So we usually try to park where the lifts are and can often manage to park there.We walk from there to the sea front.We go on the amusements and the ghost train, then we have tea.After that we go home.
